TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit PageTheme extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示页主题的基类，页主题是用于定义网站中的页和控件之间统一外观的资源的集合。

span.span: Represents the base class for a page theme, which is a collection of resources that are used to define a consistent look across pages and controls in a Web site.

summary.span: 可以通过配置或页指令设置页主题。

span.span: The page theme can be set through configuration or the page directive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 页面和控件开发人员不要使用， ，或直接类。Page and control developers do not use the , , or classes directly. ASP.NET 分析器和运行时使用的这些类用于将 ASP.NET 主题和页面和特定类型的控件的控件外观文件中定义的样式表元素应用。These classes are used by the ASP.NET parser and runtime to apply style sheet elements that are defined in ASP.NET themes and control skins files to pages and specific types of controls. 页开发人员启用 （或禁用） 使用的页面主题和属性。Page developers enable (or disable) page themes using the and properties. 有关页主题的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information about page themes, see [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，获取 对象的目录的相对 URL。

span.span: When overridden a derived class, gets the relative URL of the directory for the object.

value.span: 一个字符串值，包含 目录的相对 URL。

span.span: A string value containing the relative URL of the directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性为抽象类。The property is abstract. 主题在编译时，将生成代码重写属性。When compiled, a theme will generate code that overrides the property. 方法使用属性解析为绝对 URL 的相对 URL。The method uses the property to resolves a relative URL to an absolute URL.

protected: abstract property System::Collections::IDictionary ^ ControlSkins { System::Collections::IDictionary ^ get(); };

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，获取可用于当前页主题的所有默认外观的名称的 接口（根据控件类型进行索引）。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets an interface of the names of all default skins that are available for the current page theme, indexed by control type.

value.span: 一个 ，表示与当前页主题关联的控件外观。

span.span: An that represents the control skins associated with the current page theme.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性为抽象类。The property is abstract. 在编译时，主题将生成代码重写此属性。When compiled, a theme will generate code that overrides this property.

span.span: Creates a lookup key object for a particular control type and skin ID.

returns.span: 一个对象，可用作字典样式集合中的查找键，该集合包含控件类型和外观 ID 信息。

span.span: An object that can be used as a lookup key in a dictionary-style collection, which contains the control type and skin ID information.

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，获取链接到此页的样式表的数组。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性为抽象类，必须在派生类中实现。The property is abstract and must be implemented in a derived class. 在编译时，主题将生成代码重写此属性。When compiled, a theme will generate code that overrides this property.

summary.span: 为分析和计算主题外观文件中的 XPath 数据绑定表达式提供支持。

span.span: Provides support for parsing and evaluating an XPath data-binding expression in theme skin files.
